name: Vanilla Chip Fruit Tart
author: Rebecca Hooper
instructions: Beat the butter and powdered sugar until fluffy. Add the flour. Press into a 12-inch pizza pan. Bake in a preheated 300Â° oven for 20 to 25 minutes or until browned. While this is baking, combine milk chips and whipping cream and microwave until smooth. Beat in the cream cheese. Pour this mixture on the cooled cookie crust. Mix sugar and cornstarch in a saucepan. Stir in pineapple and lemon juices. Cook and stir until thickened. While this is cooking, peel, clean and arrange fresh fruit on top of the cream cheese mixture on the crust. Now drizzle the cooled cornstarch mixture over the fresh fruit and serve.
